Public Member Functions

Buffer Class Reference
MPI Communication

Detailed Description

Buffer for sending atoms and groups between processors.

Definition at line 27 of file Buffer.h.

#include <Buffer.h>

void readParam ( std::istream &  in) [virtual]

Read capacities and allocate buffers.

Read parameters atomCapacity and ghostCapacity (see allocate) and allocate buffers.

Reimplemented from ParamComposite.

Definition at line 78 of file Buffer.cpp.

References Buffer::allocate(), ParamComposite::readBegin(), ParamComposite::readEnd(), and UTIL_THROW.

void allocate ( int  atomCapacity,
int  ghostCapacity 
)

Allocate send and recv buffers.

Calculate amounts of memory required to accommodate specified numbers of local atoms and ghosts, and allocate buffers using the larger value.

Parameters:
atomCapacitymax expected number of local atoms.
ghostCapacitymax expected number of ghost atoms.

void beginSendBlock ( BlockDataType  sendType,
int  sendGroupSize = 0 
)

Clear the send buffer prior to packing and set atomtype.

Sets sendSize() to zero, the send pointer to the beginning of the send buffer, and sendType to the type of data to be sent. If sendType = Group, also set sendGroupSize.

false if an incomplete block was received, true otherwise.

void sendRecv ( MPI::Intracomm &  comm,
int  source,
int  dest 
)

Receive from processor send and send to processor recv.

After transmission, clears the send buffer for reuse, by calling clearSend(), and sets the receive buffer for unpacking, by setting recvSize() to the total number of atoms recieved and setting the receive pointer to first atom to be unpacked.

Throws an Exception if atomType() == NONE or sendSize() == 0.

Parameters:
commMPI communicator object
sourceMPI rank of processor from which data is sent
destMPI rank of processor to which data is sent

Definition at line 466 of file Buffer.cpp.

References UTIL_THROW.

Referenced by Exchanger::exchangeAtoms(), and Exchanger::update().

void send ( MPI::Intracomm &  comm,
int  dest 
)

Send a complete buffer.

Upon sending buffer, clears the send buffer for reuse by calling clearSend().

Parameters:
commMPI communicator
destrank of processor to which data is sent

void packAtom ( Atom &  atom)

Pack an Atom for exchange of ownership.

Appends an atom to the send buffer, and increments sendSize().

Throws an Exception if sendType != ATOM.

Parameters:
atomAtom object to be sent.

Definition at line 263 of file Buffer.cpp.

void unpackAtom ( Atom &  atom)

Receive ownership of an Atom.

Unpacks an atom from recv buffer into atom, and decrements recvSize().

Parameters:
atomAtom object into which data is received.
